name: lollms-copilot
description: Integrates lollms-server for code generation, modification, and commit messages.

commands.title: LOLLMS: Generate Code from Preceding Comment/Docstring
LOLLMS: Show Setup Wizard / Reconfigure Server

lollms.serverUrl.description: Base URL of the running lollms-server (e.g., http://localhost:9600).

lollms.apiKey.description: API Key for the lollms-server (if required).

lollms.codeGenPromptPrefix.default: Implement the following functionality described in the comment/docstring:
lollms.codeGenPromptPrefix.description: Text prepended to the comment/docstring before sending for code generation.

lollms.codeGenPromptSuffix.description: Text appended after the comment/docstring for code generation (e.g., hint the language).

lollms.contextPromptPrefix.default:
Based on the provided file context and the user's request, generate or modify the code as described.

--- CONTEXT FILES ---
lollms.contextPromptPrefix.description: Text prepended before file context is included in the prompt.

lollms.contextPromptSuffix.description: Text appended after file context but before the user's specific generation/modification request.

lollms.commitMsgPromptPrefix.default:
Generate a concise Git commit message in the conventional commit format (e.g., feat: ...) that summarizes the following staged changes:

```diff
lollms.commitMsgPromptPrefix.description: Text prepended to the git diff for commit message generation.

lollms.commitMsgPromptSuffix.description: Text appended after the git diff for commit message generation.

lollms.defaultModelParameters.description: Default generation parameters for LOLLMS requests (can be overridden).

lollms.contextTokenWarningThreshold.description: Warn the user if the estimated token count for context generation exceeds this value (very rough estimate).

lollms.includeFilePathsInContext.description: Include the relative file path in the context prompt sent to the LLM.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
